summary: A cute new follower based on SkyHamm0r's Forte preset named Francesca. Francesca can be found hanging out in the Drunken huntsman in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new follower based on the Forte preset from SkyHamm0r, the follower is named Francesca and she has skills and perks related to stealth and melee combat. Francesca will level with the player (should be unlimited) and has skills in onehanded and Archery. This follower mod is standalone you just need the original Skyrim game and install this mod then just enjoy a cute new follower. Francesca can be located in Whiterun in the Drunken huntsman inn, voice type is vanilla, body type is UNP. Hair colour has been changed to a slightly darker grey. francesca is armed with a glass sword, bow and has 400 glass arrows. Follower has been tested with EFF and works fine, I don't own AFT or UFO so cannot tell if Francesca will be compatible with those mods, please leave a message in the comments page if follower is not compatible with those mods. 
  

[b]Location : Whiterun Drunken Huntsman

Marriable : Yes

Essential : Yes

Weight : 30
[/b]
Installation : Active Francesca follower.esp into your data folder and install the meshes and textures into your data folder either manually or with NMM.

Uninstallation : Remove Francesca follower.esp from your data folder and remove any loose files installed by this mod.

Updates : Face gen data is now in the correct place in the file, thanks to georgejbps for pointing out this error. If you have already downloaded the earlier version of this mod just uninstall the old version and re-install the new version, then this should solve any further face problems.   

Credits:
SkyHamm0r for the beautiful preset
 UNP body by dimon
Eyes of Beauty by Lograam
Fair Skin Complexion by HHaley
XP32 Maximum Skeleton by XP32
KS Hair Renewal by KS for the hair
Apachii Skyhair by Apachii
Pretty Face by Tktk
author: hooperdragon
